asw1013.util

Class UserListFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • asw1013.util.UserListFile

  • public class UserListFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to read and write data from the XML file of users. This class is a singleton (only one instance per JVM is allowed) to solve concurrency problems.
